00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *fic;
00028     unsigned char buf[1];
00029     struct List *list, *cell;
00030     struct GenBlock *block;
00031     BOOL true = TRUE;
00032  
00033     adfEnvInitDefault();
00034 
00035     adfChgEnvProp(PR_USEDIRC,&true);
00036 
00037     /* display or not the physical / logical blocks and W or R */
00038     adfChgEnvProp(PR_USE_RWACCESS,&true);
00039  
00040     /* create and mount one device */
00041     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00042     if (!hd) {
00043         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00044         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00045     }
00046 
00047     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00048 
00049     if (adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE )!=RC_OK) {
00050         fprintf(stderr, "can't create floppy\n");
00051         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00052         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00053     }
00054 
00055     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00056     if (!vol) {
00057         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00058         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00059         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00060     }
00061 
00062     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "file_1a","w");
00063     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00064     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00065     adfCloseFile(fic);
00066 
00067     puts("\ncreate file_1a");
00068     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00069 
00070     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00071     puts("\ncreate dir_5u");
00072     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00073 
00074     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00075     while(cell) {
00076         printEntry(cell->content);
00077         cell = cell->next;
00078     }
00079     adfFreeDirList(list);
00080 
00081     puts("\nremove file_1a");
00082     adfRemoveEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"file_1a");
00083     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00084 
00085     adfRemoveEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00086     puts("\nremove dir_5u");
00087     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00088 
00089     cell = list = adfGetDelEnt(vol);
00090     while(cell) {
00091         block =(struct GenBlock*) cell->content;
00092        printf("%s %d %d %ld\n",block->name,block->type,block->secType,
00093             block->sect);
00094         cell = cell->next;
00095     }
00096     adfFreeDelList(list);
00097 
00098     adfUndelEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,883); // file_1a
00099     puts("\nundel file_1a");
00100     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00101 
00102     adfUndelEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,885); // dir_5u
00103     puts("\nundel dir_5u");
00104     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00105 
00106     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00107     while(cell) {
00108         printEntry(cell->content);
00109         cell = cell->next;
00110     }
00111     adfFreeDirList(list);
00112 
00113 
00114     adfUnMount(vol);
00115     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00116 
00117     adfEnvCleanUp();
00118 
00119     return 0;
00120 }
